home.about_text_1: The AFA is the association formed by the majority of the school's families. The board of directors is responsible for coordinating various activities. Joining the board is voluntary. Therefore, any help from you, no matter how small, will be very welcome.
home.about_text_2: The board organizes and manages extracurricular activities intended to complement the children's education, and collaborates in many other activities throughout the school year.
home.about_text_3: It also participates in organizing popular festivals: Castanyada, TiÃ³, Sant Jordi, End of Year...
home.about_contact: For any information, you can find us at the AFA office on Tuesdays from 9:00 to 9:30 and Fridays from 16:30 to 17:00.
about_functions: Raise awareness and guide parents regarding their responsibility for their children's education.
Channel initiatives and suggestions from parents.
Manage the acquisition and distribution of common materials and books.
Organize and manage extracurricular or complementary activities.
Participate in social and cultural activities organized at the municipal level that may be of interest to schools.
Collaborate in the school's festivals and cultural acts.

1.description: We transform traditional classrooms into motivating environments that foster creativity and collaborative work.

2.title: Playground Renaturalization
2.description: More green, less concrete. A project to bring life to recess with shaded areas, a school garden, and inclusive play structures.

3.title: Digitalization & Open Library
3.description: We want a library that is the cultural heart of the center. Vote to approve the purchase of new furniture and e-readers.

info_box.title: How does the process work?
info_box.text: We have designed this unique form to make your life easier. You can register all your children at once. If any activity has excess demand, we guarantee a fair process respecting the order of entry.

important_info.title: Important Information
important_info.text: Activities will only take place if there are enough students. If there is an excess of students, registration order will be respected.
